Uses of Package
org.xmlunit.validation

  • Packages that use org.xmlunit.validation 
    Package Description
    org.xmlunit.assertj.error
    Contains internal classes of XMLUnit's AssertJ support that are only public as an implementation detail.
    org.xmlunit.assertj3.error
    Contains internal classes of XMLUnit's AssertJ 3.x support that are only public as an implementation detail.
    org.xmlunit.validation
    Validation of XML documents and schemas.
  • Classes in org.xmlunit.validation used by org.xmlunit.assertj.error 
    Class Description
    ValidationProblem
    A validation "problem" which may be an error or a warning.
  • Classes in org.xmlunit.validation used by org.xmlunit.assertj3.error 
    Class Description
    ValidationProblem
    A validation "problem" which may be an error or a warning.
  • Classes in org.xmlunit.validation used by org.xmlunit.validation 
    Class Description
    ValidationProblem
    A validation "problem" which may be an error or a warning.
    ValidationProblem.ProblemType
    The type of validation problem encountered.
    ValidationResult
    The result of a validation.
    Validator
    Validates a piece of XML against a schema given in a supported language or the definition of such a schema itself.
